name: Super Scalloped Taters
author: R.G.

ingredients.name: baking potatoes, peeled and thinly sliced

instructions: Bring milk in a saucepan to boiling over medium-high heat. Add potatoes and butter or margarine. Cover and lower heat to simmer. Cook 15 minutes. Pour potatoes and milk into a greased casserole. Add 1/4 cup of each cheese. Mix well. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Bake in a preheated 325Â° oven 1 hour.
